name: River Express
description:
LudumDare 47 : Stuck in a Loop
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/river-express

In River Express your goal is to create a looping river path to carry all passenger to the platform of the same color as their shirt.  Successfully complete the loop to get them "Stuck in a loop" to win the level.

There are a total of 7 levels.

How To Play:

  • Use WASD/Arrow keys to move the cursor to create a path.
  • Path must start and end on the starting tile
  • Once you complete the loop the tire will automatically flow down the path 
  • You win when you successfully get the passengers stuck in a loop

Hint: You can create cross sections

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows: Create Path
  • SPACE: Enter Building Mode 
    • This mode is what allows you to place tracks
  • R: Reset path
